attributes.action: Leeds City Council to place traffic lights at Deepdale park, Boston Spa
attributes.background: Deepdale park is situated in Boston Spa with a busy (fast moving) road needed to cross to enter. In the interest of safety for the children and parents of the village traffic lights are needed. Will it take an accident or god forbid a fatality for action to be taken?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

http://democracy.leeds.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
